The Lake District attracts over 15 million tourists each year. Given the British weather and its rural setting, what will our reviewers think of a holiday at home?

[img]http://extraimago.com/images/2015/08/25/11449d20fb49ab92a4a9d732b0a1563a.jpg[/img]

This year its estimated that three quarters of us Brits will holiday at home in the UK, so our travel guides are visiting the Lake District to get the lowdown on what a week long caravan holiday there offers.
